title: Command-line Linux system monitoring
description: Access system performance details via the command line

flashcards.question: uptime
flashcards.answer: shows system uptime and load average

flashcards.question: vmstat
flashcards.answer: shows system memory, processes, interrupts, paging, block I/O, and CPU info.

flashcards.question: dstat
flashcards.answer: view processes, memory, paging, I/O, CPU, etc., in real-time. All-in-one for vmstat, iostat, netstat, and ifstat.

flashcards.question: iftop
flashcards.answer: network traffic viewer. Ex: iftop -i eth0

flashcards.question: iotop
flashcards.answer: interactive I/O viewer. Get an overview of storage r/w activity.
